nodes.title: Sitewhere 2.0.5
Fixes for device registration and persisting device status.
Support configuration of caching per API channel.
Add batch operation manager to tenant engine lifecycle.
Use tenant id as part of command delivery topic names.
Separate device stream APIs from device management.
Use snapshot version for grpc apis.
Externalize gRPC models and API for reuse in other projects.
Cleaning up protocol buffer API.
Jev/device events
Advertise microservice in Consul based on k8s pod IP address
Remove HBase artifacts since it is no longer supported.
Replace existing service discovery mechanism with Consul.
Remove Hazelcast and replace with local EHCache on gRPC connections.
Make query for InfluxDB command invocation by id more efficient.
Add STOMP ActiveMQ Event Source. #644
Update logo and admin application images.
Added code of conduct
Sitewhere 1.13.0
add ability for mongodb connection to use ssl
allow assignment specific retention policy for influx events
check for val being null in ellipsis function
Command Invocation Handle required and non required Parameters
Influxdb add ability to specify time precision in event meta data
Influxdb allow creation of user defined tags based on assignment meta…
Fix handling of assignmentTypes in InfluxDB persistence
improve robustness of rabbitmq inbound event receiver connection
Make RabbitMQ Connection More Robust
Improve RabbitMQ Connection Robustness
fix batch command not execute
update the tenants collection user list when a user has been deleted
add restdoc zip, javadoc and source jars to maven install
disable failOnError for javadoc; add rest documentation generation task
Sitewhere 1.6.0
Expose MQTT port
Sitewhere 1.3.0
Sitewhere 1.2.0
Added Serializable interface to rest model classes
fix connection broken issue in mongodb cluster
Sitewhere 1.0.2
Sitewhere 1.0.2
Update README.md
Update README.md
fix:asset & tenant_${tenant.id
feat: add script to publish docker images in tag.
chore: Update license header.
chore: Bump microservice library version.
fix: Fix substitution of vars in mqtt outbound connector.
fix: Use new GraalVM Docker image repository.
fix: Update microservice lib for KStream exception handling fix.
fix: Update to microservices library 3.0.2 to fix Redis password issue.
fix: v3.0.1 point release for Redis and other fixes.
Sitewhere 3.0.0
chore: Release
fix: Fixes for RDB device type bugs.
chore: Upgrade microservice library version.
fix: User management fixes.
chore: Bump microservices library version.
feat: Add logic to check for existing tenant data.
fix: Fix authentication and add system user support.
feat: Move user mgmt to common microservice library.
feat: Use updated user mgmt apis and expose via REST.
feat: Create Keycloak OpenID Connect client.
fix: Add Keycloak FQDN and move settings to environment variables.
feat: Add Keycloak user management support.
fix: Fix String key used for topic expecting UUID.
Upgrade to Quarkus 1.7.2
feat: add asset to device registration.
fix: Remove catalog.
Merge SiteWhere 3.0 beta code to master.
fix: Add REST methods for customer/area assignment summaries.
fix: Remove placeholder configurations.
fix: Add missing methods and fix marshaling for cust/area types.
fix: Fix rdb decl for group elements and API for adding them.
feat: Support device assignment summaries.
fix: Fix issues with add/update/delete command params.
fix: Update InfluxDB implementation for new architecture.
feat: Update to use new event APIs.
feat: Use improved pattern for gRPC routing.
feat: Add initial support for device summaries.
fix: Tenant API updates. Remove UUID and use token.
Lb/change version fix user request
feat: Add min/max value/date for mx state change tracking.
Lb/syncope role
feat: Refactor state management. Update event code to use new APIs.
Sitewhere 2.1.1
Fix known fatal bugs
fix: Display both service and core lib versions in banner. #827
Da/827/show core lib version
fix: Properly implement event management Kafka processing.
Sitewhere 2.1.1
fix syncope
fix syncope
fix syncope
Lb/sitewhere 3.0.0/fix syncope
Refactoring dataset templates and Groovy interaction for bootstrap.
add user update logic
Fix compilation warnings and add better debug logging for inbound pipeline.
Add provisioning phase to component lifecycle.
Log errors in Syncope token refresh process.
Remove defaulted date range limit. #774
Fix asset type marshaling. Fix MongoDB replication set behavior.
Adds logging to bootstrap process for tenant engines.
Use unlimited retries with random fallback rather than exponential.
Fix issue with batch element processing date not returned. #769
Move MongoDB indexing into background thread. #767
Add device types to assignment search + fix device/assn indexes.
Da/fix batch operation processing
Various fixes for tenant management.
Separate instance management API and offer via gRPC.
Update zone bounds/info so that it's different than area bounds.
Sitewhere 2.1.0
Use updated Java search APIs.
Allow microservice to use both cached and uncached versions of remote APIs.
Use updated API naming for getting active assignments.
Refactor to offer tenant management API to all microservices. #752
Support multiple assignments per device. #750
Use updated search APIs/gRPC models.
Remove old duplicate check logic.
Add metrics server API with Prometheus HTTP endpoint implementation.
Support tree structures showing customer/area hierarchy.
Sitewhere 2.1.0 Beta 1
Add thread for refreshing Syncope auth token at an interval.
Change to static final vars for Prometheus metrics. #735
Fix Groovy model initializers for device/event management.
Add separate component for bootstrapping tenants
Convert to Prometheus metric APIs for monitoring.
Improve Kafka topic handling and add better logging for producer lifecycle.
Refactor/streamline Kafka event pipeline. #733
Initial support for Syncope user management impl. #724
Implement exponential backoff in Zk bootstrap indicator checks. #730
Allow gRPC exponential backoff settings to be set via environment.
Properly handle shutdown of state updates thread.
Finish initial merge of user/tenant management into instance management
Create a separate log level for gRPC internal messages
Allow MongoDB log level to be set for service that use persistence
Merge updates from 2.0.7 into 2.1.0
Release Sitewhere 2.0.7
Jev/health check
Sitewhere 2.0.6
Deliver state change events on device create/update/delete.
Add more context for Groovy filter.
